comment.body: Hi. Regarding your [site](http://127.0.0.1:43110/duducat.bit/), for example the file [20170826_经济学人.mobi](file:///Documents/Kindle/Kindle%20%E6%9D%82%E5%BF%97/2017_The%20Economist%EF%BC%88%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E5%AD%A6%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%89/20170826_%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E5%AD%A6%E4%BA%BA.mobi) is pointing to your local user-Documents folder, not to ZeroNet/data folder, so that no body can download any of your contents. Please reply. http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=leftside
